Scripts.OnEnter: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip) OneMacroTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip) OneMacroTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip) OneMacroTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip) OneMacroTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: -- 显示提示 if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip) OneMacroTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: -- 隐藏提示 if type(this.tooltip) == "string" and this.tooltip ~= "" then OneMacroTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if arg1 == "LeftButton" then -- 隐藏选择中选项卡，提升拖动流畅性 local tabId = PanelTemplates_GetSelectedTab(this:GetParent()) getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName() .. "TabFrame" .. tabId):Hide() this:GetParent():StartMoving() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: -- 显示选择中选项卡 local tabId = PanelTemplates_GetSelectedTab(this:GetParent()) getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName() .. "TabFrame" .. tabId):Show() this:GetParent():StopMovingOrSizing()

Scripts.OnEnter: OneMacroTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") OneMacroTooltip:ClearLines() OneMacroTooltip:SetText("关闭窗口") OneMacroTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad:
-- 滚动框架载入 ScrollFrame_OnLoad()
-- 显示区域 --getglobal(this:GetName() .. "Area"):Show()
OneMacroEditor:OnLoadOperationListBox()
-- this.area = true this.text = "我是自述编辑框内容..."

Scripts.OnMouseDown: -- 按下滚动框架编辑框获得焦点 getglobal(this:GetName() .. "EditBox"):SetFocus()
